data.text:
――Blue skies... White clouds... And blowing beside them, the 
winds of youth!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>――Blue skies... White clouds... And blowing beside them, the 
<story>winds of youth!

data.text: Here we go! Summer training camp! It's traaaining tiiiiime! And, and! Once we're done with that――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Here we go! Summer training camp! It's traaaining tiiiiime! And, and! Once we're done with that――

data.text:
Hey, apparently they're doing a festival tonight! 
Once we're done training, let's go together! Nn~ It's gonna be so 
fun~♪
data.name: Peppy Umamusume
data.processed:
<story>Hey, apparently they're doing a festival tonight! 
<story>Once we're done training, let's go together! Nn~ It's gonna be so 
<story>fun~♪

data.text: ...Since when was this a "together" thing...?
data.name: Tired-Looking Umamusume
data.processed: <story>...Since when was this a "together" thing...?

data.text:
.........Mmm~, thanks for the food. 
Seeing that day 1 is the best way to start summer training...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>.........Mmm~, thanks for the food. 
<story>Seeing that day 1 is the best way to start summer training...

data.text: ――No, no, wait! I need to get ready for training!
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Need to talk it off again?
Need to talk it off again?

data.processed: <story>――No, no, wait! I need to get ready for training!

data.text:
Thanks for worrying about me, but... I'll be fine! 
I'm going to go get ready, okay?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Thanks for worrying about me, but... I'll be fine! 
<story>I'm going to go get ready, okay?

data.text:
...I got a bad feeling about that uncharacteristic reply. 
I noticed it during training, too――
data.processed:
<story>...I got a bad feeling about that uncharacteristic reply. 
<story>I noticed it during training, too――

data.text:
Whew... Trainer-san! 
I'm done with the sand sprints, just as... 
...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Whew... Trainer-san! 
<story>I'm done with the sand sprints, just as... 
<story>...

data.text: Whoa! Isn't that there the pair of Umamusume-chans who people think are connected by fate even though the two themselves are awkward around each other building up their mutual bond!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Whoa! Isn't that there the pair of Umamusume-chans who people think are connected by fate even though the two themselves are awkward around each other building up their mutual bond!?

data.text:
Woohohoho, they're lining up for concessions together, how 
nice... Wait, ah! The black-haired Umamusume-chan tripped――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Woohohoho, they're lining up for concessions together, how 
<story>nice... Wait, ah! The black-haired Umamusume-chan tripped――

data.text: ...But what's this! With truly cyborg-like reflexes, she catches the other girl's hand and holds on tiiight...!? ...And they get in line while holding haaaaands!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: ...But what's this! With truly cyborg-like reflexes, she catches the other girl's hand and holds on tiiight...!? ...And they get in line while holding haaaaands!?

data.text: ...Hngh!!! ...HHHHnnngghhgghh!!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>...Hngh!!! ...HHHHnnngghhgghh!!!!

data.text:
.....Pweehhh.... Somehow managed to hold on... 
Almost gave up the ghost there...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>.....Pweehhh.... Somehow managed to hold on... 
<story>Almost gave up the ghost there...

data.text:
All right! Trainer-san! 
Time for our next bit of training!
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Want to take a fangirl break?
Want to take a fangirl break?

data.processed:
<story>All right! Trainer-san! 
<story>Time for our next bit of training!

data.text:
Huh?! ...Nonononononoo! I'm all good!! 
Let's go train! Okay?!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Huh?! ...Nonononononoo! I'm all good!! 
<story>Let's go train! Okay?!

data.text:
...Maybe she's trying to get training done as fast as she can so 
she can get to fangirling at the festival.

choices.text: Let's go to the festival once we're done.
choices.processed: <size=41>Let's go to the festival once we're done.</size>

data.processed:
<story>...Maybe she's trying to get training done as fast as she can so 
<story>she can get to fangirling at the festival.

data.text:
......! Oooooooooh~? 
The festival, I like the sound of that! Yes, let's go indeed!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>......! Oooooooooh~? 
<story>The festival, I like the sound of that! Yes, let's go indeed!

data.text:
Now, what stall should we hit up first!? 
What do you want to do, Trainer-sa――?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Now, what stall should we hit up first!? 
<story>What do you want to do, Trainer-sa――?

data.text:
Senpai~! Check it out, you've gotta try this shaved ice! 
The color and taste are both, like, totally crazy!
data.name: Kouhai Umamusume
data.processed:
<story>Senpai~! Check it out, you've gotta try this shaved ice! 
<story>The color and taste are both, like, totally crazy!

data.text:
Hehe! Your tongue's looking, like, totally crazy too, ya know? 
Look, it's all blue from the syrup.
data.name: Senpai Umamusume
data.processed:
<story>Hehe! Your tongue's looking, like, totally crazy too, ya know? 
<story>Look, it's all blue from the syrup.

data.text: ...Sssssssssssssssssssssssss.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>...Sssssssssssssssssssssssss.

data.text:
N-Now, what stall should we hit up first!? 
What do you want to do, Trainer-san?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>N-Now, what stall should we hit up first!? 
<story>What do you want to do, Trainer-san?

data.text:
Normally, she'd be talking up a storm with stars in her eyes... 
Something was definitely going on here. I ought to ask her 
about it.
data.processed:
<story>Normally, she'd be talking up a storm with stars in her eyes... 
<story>Something was definitely going on here. I ought to ask her 
<story>about it.

data.text:
...Hmm? The beach? 
Is the thing you wanted to do over here, Trainer-san?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>...Hmm? The beach? 
<story>Is the thing you wanted to do over here, Trainer-san?

data.text: ...Eh? N-no, not... really?
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: You're holding back from what you want to do, aren't you?
choices.processed: <size=28>You're holding back from what you want to do, aren't you?</size>

choices.text: You're holding back from what you want to do, aren't you?
choices.processed: <size=28>You're holding back from what you want to do, aren't you?</size>

data.processed: <story>...Eh? N-no, not... really?

data.text:
What!? No, I'm not! 
After all, what I want to do――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>What!? No, I'm not! 
<story>After all, what I want to do――

data.text: Is tag along for whatever you want do, Trainer-san! ...That's what!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Is tag along for whatever you want do, Trainer-san! ...That's what!

data.text:
I mean... You're always playing along with me and my fangirling. 
You're an incredibly good listener.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>I mean... You're always playing along with me and my fangirling. 
<story>You're an incredibly good listener.

data.text:
And thanks to that my fangirling's gotten funner than ever. Even 
I can tell, I've been acting giddy all the time lately.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>And thanks to that my fangirling's gotten funner than ever. Even 
<story>I can tell, I've been acting giddy all the time lately.

data.text:
It's to the point where I can't go back to fangirling without you, 
Trainer-san...!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>It's to the point where I can't go back to fangirling without you, 
<story>Trainer-san...!

data.text:
Basically, you're important to me too, Trainer-san. 
You're my irreplacable partner――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Basically, you're important to me too, Trainer-san. 
<story>You're my irreplacable partner――

data.text: Nay! You are my comrade in arms!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Nay! You are my comrade in arms!!

data.text:
Many Umamusume are driven to run, every day, with feelings in 
their hearts more passionate than ever imagined. This is the time 
known as the Great Umamusume-chan Pweciousness Era.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Many Umamusume are driven to run, every day, with feelings in 
<story>their hearts more passionate than ever imagined. This is the time 
<story>known as the Great Umamusume-chan Pweciousness Era.

data.text:
To the left and to the right, in front and behind, everywhere you 
look, Umamusume-chans are shining bright! There's no telling 
when the pweciousness will kill you. Truly―― this is a battlefield.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>To the left and to the right, in front and behind, everywhere you 
<story>look, Umamusume-chans are shining bright! There's no telling 
<story>when the pweciousness will kill you. Truly―― this is a battlefield.

data.text:
We take to this battlefield together. When we're struck by an 
explosion of the feels, we lean on each others' shoulders... 
And when it comes time, we share in our joys.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>We take to this battlefield together. When we're struck by an 
<story>explosion of the feels, we lean on each others' shoulders... 
<story>And when it comes time, we share in our joys.

data.text: That's what it means to be ―― a comrade in arms.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>That's what it means to be ―― a comrade in arms.

data.text:
But wait. I'm always the one getting supported, aren't I? 
Can you really call that "leaning on each other"? More like you're 
giving me a piggyback ride, isn't it?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>But wait. I'm always the one getting supported, aren't I? 
<story>Can you really call that "leaning on each other"? More like you're 
<story>giving me a piggyback ride, isn't it?

data.text:
So I've decided! Whatever you want to do, Trainer-san, whatever 
your wish... This time, Digitan's going to be the one to grant it!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>So I've decided! Whatever you want to do, Trainer-san, whatever 
<story>your wish... This time, Digitan's going to be the one to grant it!

data.text:
Don't be shy, ask me anything! 
I'll put everything I've got into helping you!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Don't be shy, ask me anything! 
<story>I'll put everything I've got into helping you!

data.text:
I was grateful for the thought, but... 
I don't want her to stop doing what she loves for my sake.
data.processed:
<story>I was grateful for the thought, but... 
<story>I don't want her to stop doing what she loves for my sake.

data.text:
The girl moving forward with an incredible love for Umamusume 
in her heart. That was the girl I wanted to support. That's why I 
scouted her.
data.processed:
<story>The girl moving forward with an incredible love for Umamusume 
<story>in her heart. That was the girl I wanted to support. That's why I 
<story>scouted her.

data.text: If she was asking me what my wish was――

choices.text: I want to see you full of life.
I want to see you full of life.

data.processed: <story>If she was asking me what my wish was――

data.text:
...Hweh? Me, full of life? 
Full of life――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>...Hweh? Me, full of life? 
<story>Full of life――

data.text:
Are you feeling it!? The Umamusume-chan's dazzling, 
unrelenting passion?! When they're full of life and happy, 
Digitan's happyyyyyyyyy!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Are you feeling it!? The Umamusume-chan's dazzling, 
<story>unrelenting passion?! When they're full of life and happy, 
<story>Digitan's happyyyyyyyyy!

data.text: So how I feel about my faves... is like how you feel... about me...?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>So how I feel about my faves... is like how you feel... about me...?

data.text:
Eh? Not even the wallflower, but me, the wall? No, uh... Why? 
...I kind of... can't believe what I'm hearing here, but...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Eh? Not even the wallflower, but me, the wall? No, uh... Why? 
<story>...I kind of... can't believe what I'm hearing here, but...

data.text:
I-I'm happy... 
...More than that, I'm honored.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>I-I'm happy... 
<story>...More than that, I'm honored.

data.text: ...Wait, more than that, I'm embarassed! It's like, when the artist you're collabing with reviews your part of the doujin, know what I mean!?
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Well, maybe not if you put it like that...
choices.processed: <size=42>Well, maybe not if you put it like that...</size>

data.processed: ...Wait, more than that, I'm embarassed! It's like, when the artist you're collabing with reviews your part of the doujin, know what I mean!?

data.text: What I want to say isssss~~! Basicallllllyyyyy~~....!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>What I want to say isssss~~! Basicallllllyyyyy~~....!!

data.text:
...I'm gonna fangirl! No more holding back! 
I'm gonna be as full of life as I possibly can!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>...I'm gonna fangirl! No more holding back! 
<story>I'm gonna be as full of life as I possibly can!

data.text:
Now let's hurry up and sign up for something where we can take 
in Umamusume-chans in all their brilliance! Anything like that 
around here!?
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Maybe bon dancing, or a test of courage?
choices.processed: <size=39>Maybe bon dancing, or a test of courage?</size>

data.processed:
<story>Now let's hurry up and sign up for something where we can take 
<story>in Umamusume-chans in all their brilliance! Anything like that 
<story>around here!?

data.text:
Oho! I knew you'd have great ideas, Trainer-san! 
They could unite their hearts in the bon dance! Or get so scared 
by the test of courage they can't help but hold hands!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Oho! I knew you'd have great ideas, Trainer-san! 
<story>They could unite their hearts in the bon dance! Or get so scared 
<story>by the test of courage they can't help but hold hands!

data.text: Kuuuuuuh! Just thinking about it's making my heart go GAHGAHGAHGAHGAHGAAAH! This is no time to dilly-dally!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Kuuuuuuh! Just thinking about it's making my heart go GAHGAHGAHGAHGAHGAAAH! This is no time to dilly-dally!

data.text: We're off to the next battlefield! My partner, Trainer-san!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>We're off to the next battlefield! My partner, Trainer-san!

title: You can't class change to Hero alone.
